snippet: This horror film, with Wes Craven credited as executive producer, has a hackneyed sleaziness.
abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews movie The Girl in the Photographs, directed by Nick Simon.
lead_paragraph: This horror film, with Wes Craven credited as executive producer, has a hackneyed sleaziness.

headline.main: Review: In ‘The Girl in the Photographs,’ Ambitious Goals Slashed
headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘The Girl in the Photographs,’ Ambitious Goals Slashed
